attributes.action: Increase the payment for getting 3 numbers in the National Lottery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the National Lottery started back in 1994, £10 was a reasonable amount of money. Now, it's not much at all.

I should suggest this should raise to £25. Then more people will be wanting to play the lottery

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
